amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 118-407 to clarify the definition of "general solicitation" and "angel investor" for purposes of the federal securities laws to ensure that startups can discuss their products and business plans at certain events, known as "demo days.".
amendment.purpose: Amendment clarifies the definition of "general solicitation" and "angel investor" for purposes of the federal securities laws to ensure that startups can discuss their products and business plans at certain events, known as "demo days.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lawler amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 278 - 146 (Roll no. 68).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lawler amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 278 - 146 (Roll no. 68).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lawler amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 278 - 146 (Roll no. 68).
